changeSet.author: wangjun
changeSet.sql: create table gateway_route( `ID` varchar(64) not null primary key comment'主键', `PREDICATES` varchar(256) not null comment '匹配路径', `URI` varchar(256) not null comment '转发的服务地址', `FILTERS` varchar(256) default '' comment '过滤器', `DELETE_FLAG` tinyint default 0 comment '是否删除,0:未删除,1:已删除', `CREATE_AT` timestamp not null default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP comment '创建时间', `UPDATE_AT` timestamp not null default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP comment '更新时间' )ENGINE = InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT = 1 CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_bin COMMENT = '路由表' ROW_FORMAT = Compact;
